    • getWhosTurn

      public int getWhosTurn()
      returns which players turn it is, 0 being first player.
      Returns:
      int 0 - 3 depending on how many players there are present

    • playerAskForCard

      public boolean playerAskForCard(int playerToAsk, String rankOfCard)
      Controls a player asking for a card from another player. If the other player has a card with that rank, the card is taken from their hand and given to another player.
      Parameters:
      playerToAsk - the player to ask
      rankOfCard - the rank of the card to ask for
      Returns:
      true if the player had the card, and takes it. false if the player did not have the card.
